value.title: Team Uses AI and Robotics to Treat Spinal Cord Injuries
value.excerpt: A team of researchers at Rutgers University has employed artificial intelligence (AI) and robotics to formulate therapeutic proteins. The team was able to successfully stabilize an enzyme that can degrade scar tissues resulting from spinal cord injuries.

value.title: AI chatbot provides emotional bond for mental health app users
value.excerpt: Results from a new peer-reviewed study show people develop emotional bonds with artificial intelligence (AI) therapy chatbots in a similar way to in-person therapists. The study evaluated 1,205 people using a mental health app developed by Wysa Ltd.

value.title: Artificial intelligence may take your job. Some lessons from my grandmother
value.excerpt: Up to 40% of all jobs now are tipped to be taken over by AI and robots in the next few decades. My grandmother, born on a farm almost a century ago, has some advice on how to cope.
